sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கூடு, சேர், இணை, சம்பந்தம்பண்ணு. கூடிக்கொள், கோர், மந்திரவாதி, இணைக்கப்பட்டிரு, சேர்க்கப்படு, சேர்ந்திரு, மயக்கு, இணைந்திரு, இணைத்துவிடு
1) to unite, to join, to bind together, to be joined, to be coupled, to be in league, to heap up, to have fellowship with, to be compact, to be a charmer
2) to tie magic charms, to charm
1) to unite with, to to make an ally of
2) to unite, to join, to ally
1) to be allied with, to be united
d) (Hiphil) to join together, to pile up (words)
e) (Hithpael) to join oneself to, to make an alliance, to league together

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to join (literally or figuratively); specifically (by means of spells) to fascinate: - charm (-er), be compact, couple (together), have fellowship with, heap up, join (self, together), league.
Cognate: H2249, H2250, H2266, H2267, H2268, H2270, H2271, H2272, H2274, H2275, H2276, H2277, H2278, H2279, H4225, H4226
